articles.title: BRICS ministers put on show of strength as Putin arrest warrant looms large - Reuters
articles.description: BRICS foreign ministers on Thursday asserted their bloc's ambition to rival Western powers but their talks in South Africa were overshadowed by questions over whether Russia's president would be arrested if he attended a summit in August.

articles.title: Neanderthal and human fire-making methods suggest different origins, shared intelligence - Phys.org
